description: The ODROID-M2 builds on the success of the Hardkernel ODROID-M1 series, offering enhanced computing power for industrial embedded systems. Powered by the RK3588S2 SoC, the ODROID-M2 provides significant improvements in both processing power and memory performance. Like the Radxa 5C and Lite models, the ODROID-M2 is equipped with the RK3588S2. This system features an octa-core […]
title: ODROID-M2 Leverages RK3588S2 SoC and Supports LPDDR5 Memory
